channel.title: I need help with a command! [525]
channel.description:
alright this is my command
[code] if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("Ahrim")){ Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 2000000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1733, 2);//needle Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 581, 4);//black robe Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1015, 4);//black skirt Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1734, 8);//thread }[/code] in my itemonitem.java i made it so you have to use the needle with the robes and the black skirt to make an ahrim set.
but i know that it deletes the money.. but i want it so if you want to do ::ahrim and you dont have enough money you cant buy it.
this is pali base, 525.

if (Engine.playerItems.haveItem(p, 995, 2000000)) {

item.title: I need help with a command! [525]
item.dc:creator: @check check
item.description:
@check wrote:

Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
.\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:1052: ‘)’ expected
if(Engine.playerItems.haveItem(p, 995, 2000000) {
^
Note: .\net\com\codeusa\clanchat\Room.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

thats what comes up in the compiler

item.title: I need help with a command! [525]
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

ok no… heres the correct one…

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("Ahrim")){ if(Engine.playerItems.haveItem(p, 995, 2000000) { Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 2000000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1733, 2);//needle Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 581, 4);//black robe Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1015, 4);//black skirt Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1734, 8);//thread } else { return; } }
that WILL work…

Read full topic

this stuff…

}

item.description:
@check wrote:

well there is no public boolean contains

theres…

public boolean haveItem2(Player paramPlayer, int paramInt1, int paramInt2) {

public boolean addItem(Player p, int itemId, int itemAmt) {

public boolean deleteItem(Player p, int itemId, int amount) {

public boolean deleteItem(Player p, int itemId, int index, int amount) {

public boolean hasPlayerItem(Player player, int itemId) {

public boolean hasPlayerItemAmount(Player player, int itemId, int itemStack) {

public boolean haveItem(Player p, int itemID) {

public boolean haveItem(Player p, int itemID, int amount) {

and thats me just serching for public boolean. there is more stuff under those i just posted the first line.
